meanings.definition: A small chin beard that is pointed and often trimmed to a point.
meanings.sent1: His goatee was neatly trimmed and pointed.
meanings.sent2: The barber shaped his goatee into a point.
meanings.sent3: The goatee on his chin made him look like a wise wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her goatee was like a tiny arrow pointing down.
meanings.sent5: The goatee added a touch of sophistication to his appearance.

meanings.definition: A man who wears a goatee.
meanings.sent1: He is known as the goatee guy in our group.
meanings.sent2: The goatee man always has a stylish beard.
meanings.sent3: The goatee wearer never fails to stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent4: The goatee gentleman is quite popular among the ladies.
meanings.sent5: His goatee gives him a unique charm that is hard to resist.
